title: Zero-Day Merchant: $1 Million For Anyone Who Can Jailbreak iOS 9
content:
One of the world's best-known zero-day salesmen claims $1 million is on offer for researchers who can provide full jailbreaks of the iPhone 6 or 6s. Applicants have until Halloween to…
